control_light_activity::tip_collection::: Tip: Lights approximately 3 feet away from your character are the most flattering.
control_light_activity::title: Control Light Activity
control_light_activity::tip_collection::: Tip: Backlight will make your subject dark and difficult to see.
Tip: Low light can produce poor shots. Shooting outside or in a sunny room can give you great light.
Tip: Good photography is all about light. Use available light as best you can.
Tip: If your subject is too dark consider moving to a location with more light.
Tip: Be careful of bright lights behind your subjects.
